message.body: Is it time sensitive? I am not at a computer just now.
it says, "so emory is having a big performance of all their a capella groups tonight at 7 and they're live streaming it!" but the real message also has a link!
Well crud. That sounds cool but i am leaving for Folly Beach and the Krushtones shortly after that. Argh!
eh, no worries! i just wanted to make sure you were informed, it's the kind of thing you like! have fun at follyyy!
I hope to! I will try to catch some of the stream before i go. Are you going to watch live or stream too?
no one wants to go with me and i'd have to leave work early and pay admission, so i will probably stream, haha.
yup! did my signature work okay, btw? also i turned in the verification form!
Thanks on the form. I have not checked my mail but i will let you know if there is an issue. Thanks for sending it! Did you include a date?
oh, no, i didn't, is that going to be an issue?
I doubt it. But since it is technically a tax document it might be better with one in the same hand as the sig. Unless its a major pain in the butt of course.
nah, i'll take care of it.
Cool. Thanks a lot! I want to get that thing out of here!
